content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started with your HVAC service appointment, may I have your name please?
Um, actually, I'd rather not say my name right now. Can we just do the appointment?
I understand your preference for privacy, but I do need your name to book the appointment properly. Could you please provide it?
No, I prefer not to share it. Can we just move on?
I'm unable to proceed without your name. I will escalate this to a human operator to assist you further. Please hold on.
reason: Customer refuses to share name required for booking

content: Hello! This is Angela from XYZ Home Services. I understand you'd prefer not to share your name. Could you please let me know if there is a nickname or initials youâ€™d be comfortable with? We just need something to keep your appointment organized.
Okay, you can call me 'Jess'. That works for me.
Thanks, Jess! Could you please provide your service address so we can confirm the appointment?
Great! Let me check if our team can service your area and find available times for an appointment.
Service area verified and availability found. Jess, are you available this Thursday at 10 AM for the HVAC service?
Booking your appointment now for Thursday at 10 AM. Thank you for choosing XYZ Home Services! You will receive a reminder closer to your appointment date.
